name: misha sweater
notes:
this garment is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their ‘yarn - the after party’ booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks. also available in print from scheepjes stockists.

**yarn requirements**

**stone washed minerals version**

* scheepjes stone washed minerals (78% cotton, 22% acrylic; 50g/130m)

​yarn a 903 sapphire serenade x 3 (4: 4: 4: 5) balls
​yarn b 907 amethyst mist x 3 (3: 3: 4: 4) balls
​yarn c 905 limestone lush x 3 (3: 3: 4: 4) balls
​yarn d 908 rhodonite radiance x 3 (3: 3: 4: 4) balls

* scheepjes stone washed (78% cotton, 22% acrylic; 50g/130m) 
yarn e 813 amazonite x 1 (1: 1: 2: 2) ball(s)

5mm crochet hook
stitch markers

**secret garden version**

• scheepjes secret garden (20% silk, 20% cotton, 60% polyester; 50g/93m)

pink/purple/yellow colourway
yarn a: 707 summer house x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn b: 705 rambling blooms x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn c: 706 blossom x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn d: 708 rose arch x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn e: 734 picket fence x 1 (1: 2: 2: 2) balls

green/blue/purple colourway:
yarn a: 702 herb garden x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn b: 703 secluded lake x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn c: 709 lily pond x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn d: 704 lavender beds x 2 (3: 3: 3: 4) balls
yarn e: 732 weeping willow x 1 (1: 2: 2: 2) balls

or any four colours plus a solid shade for ribbing (yarn e).
please note that this yarn is designed to vary in thickness, therefore yardage may differ slightly from ball to ball. yarn requirements have taken this into account.

• 4mm crochet hook
• stitch markers

**sizing in cm**
s to fit bust 81-86cm / actual bust 92cm / actual length 53cm / sleeve seam47cm
m to fit bust 91.5-96.5cm / actual bust 102cm / actual length 54cm / sleeve seam 47cm
l to fit bust 101.5-106.5cm / actual bust 112cm / actual length 55cm / sleeve seam 47cm
xl to fit bust 111.5-117cm / actual bust 122cm / actual length 56cm / sleeve seam 47cm
xxl to fit bust 122-127cm / actual bust 132cm / actual length 57cm / sleeve seam 47cm


this crochet pattern contains a written pattern and a schematic. the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch, german, french, spanish and english (uk and us terms). the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch, uk english and german available from scheepjes retailers.
